nodes.text: HH-4 grenade launchers were support units manufactured by Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc. in use by certain smugglers working with the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. The launchers had a capacity of five grenades, which were set on a timer and were capable of taking out a small Imperial squad.
The HH-4 launcher appears in the Star Wars: Battlefront video game series.
